dct_title_s: Südliches Afrika 1:2 500 000 = Southern Africa 1:2 500 000 = Afrique Australe 1:2 500 000 = África Austral 1:2 500 000 = Yuzhnaya Afrika 1:2 500 000 ; Botswana, Lesotho, Mozambique, Namibia, South Africa, Swaziland, Zimbabwe / Reise Know-How.
dct_description_sm: Road map and tourist map. Panel title. Rip and waterproof. At head of panel: Reise Know-How Southern Africa 1:2,5 Mill. Relief shown by contour lines, gradient tints and spot heights. Depths shown by bathymetric tints. Legend includes tourist features such as places of interest, archaeological site, rock paintings. "exactly high lines ; high layers-relief ; GPS-compatible, with gradiant ; classified road network ; detailed location index."--back panel. Includes coverage map, location map, color illustration, and publisher advertisement on cover. Includes index, as well as a index to national parks.
